about:
I recently graduated with a Bachelor's of Computer Science. Born and raised in the RGV. Set  to graduate with a Bachelor's Degree in Spring of 2024.


I enjoy working on random projects and attempting to expand my knowdlege in the CS field as well as other interests such as. 
(Data Analysis, Mechanics, Game Dev and Content Creation)

 On my free time I'll enjoy doing exercise, gaming and playing sports or going out with friends. You can also count on me watching Anime. (Attack on Titan!!!) Other than that I feel like im a very understanding and curious person who likes to try new things and will become obssesed if intrigued enough haha.
